text: Up in Smoke is a 1978 American comedy movie directed by Lou Adler. It is the first movie out of Cheech & Chong's movie series and Tommy Chong, Cheech Marin, Edie Adams, Stacy Keach, Tom Skeritt and Ellen Barkin. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1978 comedy movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:1970s English- language movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies about smoking Category:Movies about music and musicians
title: Up in Smoke
